description: This studio apartment is on the first floor of a 3-story house in the Mott Haven Historic district of the South Bronx. The building is also home to a latino arts organization, ID Studio Theater, and an artist—who lives in the studio apartment next door. We're next door to BronxArtSpace, a great community gallery, and a public library. The studio is 2 blocks from the local 6 train, and 5 blocks from the express 4/5 that can get you to Harlem in 1 stop and the Metropolitan Museum in 2 stops.
name: Studio in Mott Haven-1 subway stop from Manhattan
review: Lovely apartment, close to subway and plenty to do in the area, very clean and such a nice area to stay over
